snippet.title: Silent Hill: The Gallows gameplay
snippet.description:
Gameplay footage of the cancelled Silent Hill fangame "Silent Hill: The Gallows" which used to be able to be downloaded from IndieDB before being delisted. It was based very loosely on Silent Hill: Downpour from Vatra Games, running on the same engine and ripping many of its assets. As far as I can tell, The Gallows is lost media. If anyone has a download link to the game that would be much appreciated. 

Here is the IndieDB page:
https://www.indiedb.com/games/silent-hill-beta-v01
